name: brresi2
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wbr(c0, cres(c1, c2), c3), wbr(c0, c1, c3))

stmt.origin: a1ii(wi(wbr(c0, cres(c1, c2), c3), wbr(c0, c1, c3)), wcel(c3, universe))

body.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, cres(c1, c2), c3), wbr(c0, c1, c3))
-| wi(wbr(c0, cres(c1, c2), c3), wbr(c0, c1, c3))
-| wcel(c3, universe)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, cres(c1, c2), c3), wbr(c0, c1, c3))
-| wi(wbr(c0, cres(c1, c2), c3), wbr(c0, c1, c3))
-| wcel(c3, universe)

body.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, cres(c1, c2), c3), wbr(c0, c1, c3))
-| wss(cres(c1, c2), c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, cres(c1, c2), c3), wbr(c0, c1, c3))
-| wcel(c3, universe)
-| wss(cres(c1, c2), c1)

|- wi(wbr(c0, cres(c1, c2), c3), wbr(c0, c1, c3))
-| wcel(c3, universe)

comment: Restriction of a binary relation. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)
